info1: Please RSVP and pay before 1 May 2023. We know this is early to commit, but this will help us tremendously to plan and make our special event possible.
info2: Accommodation details will be send out at a time closer to the event.
info3: Check-in-time is on Sunday 17 December at 14:30 and checkout time is on Tuesday 19 December at 12:00.
info4: The 'Bring & Braai' on Sunday is optional, but we‚Äôd love to have a chilled evening around the fire with all of you. However, it‚Äôs also fine if you should prefer a quiet night in.
info5: Breakfast and lunch on Monday is self catering. There is an equipped kitchen with a fridge in your cottage.
info6: We kindly request that no photos be taken during the ceremony. We have a brilliant photographer that will cover this part, and we promise to share all the beautiful photos afterwards.
info7: Please note that the nearest town is Greyton, so be sure to pick up your goodies before heading through.
info8: Because of the accommodation cost, we do not expect any wedding gifts. Your presence is enough.
